args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Child Seat May Allow Excessive Movement/FMVSS 213

Chicco USA, Inc. (Chicco) is recalling certain MyFit Zip Air Harness and Booster child restraint seats (CRS) with model numbers 07079561970070 and 04079561190070.  In certain configurations, the child seat may allow excessive chest movement in a crash.  As such, these child seats fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard number 213, "Child Restraint Systems."A child seat that fails to properly restrain a child increases the risk of injury in a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 30984.0"
